allfiles.value: download all related data as ZIP

description.value: A morphological and electrophysiological model of human pyramidal cells in layer 2/3. This model is one of the six human layer 2 and layer 3 pyramidal cells that were modeled, integrating detailed anatomical and physiological data from both fresh and postmortem tissues from human temporal cortex. A Live Paper introduces interactively this modeled human L2/3 neurons, including their morphology, experimental measurements and modelling response to current and synaptic input, see Eyal et al., 2018 More details can be found in the following paper: "Human Cortical Pyramidal Neurons: From Spines to Spikes via Models" Eyal Guy, Verhoog Matthijs B., Testa-Silva Guilherme, Deitcher Yair, Benavides-Piccione Ruth, DeFelipe Javier, de Kock Christiaan P. J., Mansvelder Huibert D., Segev Idan https://doi.org/10.3389/fncel.2018.00181

usedDataset.value: Morphological data of human neocortical pyramidal neurons (v1.0)

title.value: Active Model of Human Cortical Pyramidal Neurons in Layer 2/3 - Cell 3/1303
